United Arab Emirates (UAE; Arabic: الإمارات العربية المتحدة al-ʾImārāt al-ʿArabīyah al-Muttaḥidah), ma ọ bụ nanị Emirates (Arabic: الإمارات al-ʾImārāt), bụ obodo dị na Western Asia (Etiti Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Ụwa).  Ọ dị na nsọtụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Arab Peninsula ma na-ekerịta ókèala ya na Oman na Saudi Arabia, ebe ha nwere oke osimiri na Ọwara Persian na Qatar na Iran.  Abu Dhabi bụ isi obodo mba ahụ, ebe Dubai, obodo kacha nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ, bụ ebe mba ụwa.
